Package com.asprise.util.jtwain

Main package; contains essential classes to perform image acquisition.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
JTwainConstants defines TWAIN contants.
 

Class Summary
Source The Source class represents a TWAIN data source.
SourceManager The SourceManager class represents a TWAIN Source Manager.
 

Exception Summary
InvalidStateException Exception indicating an invalid state.
JTwainException A general exception for TWAIN related operations.
OperationException Exception indicating an operation exception.
 

Package com.asprise.util.jtwain Description

Main package; contains essential classes to perform image acquisition.
